home_component.subtitle: I develop responsive web and movile experiences with clean architecture and following SOLID principles.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.text_about_me:
I am a Frontend Angular/Ionic developer. I studied Multiplatform Application Development in Progrsea Formación, I also have been able to internship in Lãberit, what they called Academy. 
 
During my studies I would like to stand out my final project where I used Angular and Ionic for the frontend and for the backend I used Node.js and as data base MongoDB. 
 
In my pass at the Academy I learned to apply Clean Architecture and the SOLID principals. As well, to interact with Github and version control with Sourcetree and Bitbucket. For the app design I used libraries as Ionic, PrimeNg, Tailwind CSS among others.

first_card.title: Clean Code
first_card.message: Apply SOLID principals and Clean Architecture.

second_card.title: Apps Design
second_card.message: Implmenting Figma designs using Tailwind Css.

third_card.title: Versions
third_card.message: Controlling versions by Sourcetree and Bitbucket.

first_card.title: Rick & Morty
first_card.message: Ionic Project done with clean architecture, where you have to log in to see all Rick & Morty characters, filter by name or status and save your favorite characters.

second_card.title: Bookish
second_card.message: Ionic Project it's being redone to follow clean architecture. This app is made to buy books online. You have to register and log in to enter and buy the books. There also two kind of user, the administrator user that is the one who can add more books to the data base and the customer user who can buy them.
